NY Senate and Transparency

by erich

Congrats to the NY Senate for beginning to open more data at http://www.nysenate.gov/opendata!

Here is the network of Senator Allocations of Funding to Community Projects (CPFs): 2009-2010 by Senator or group and zipcode.Â  Line width is proportional to funding allocation.
